title: Zoe Bäckstedt: ‘Obviously, I Want to Win Everything, That Is Why I Ride a Bike’
content:
When Bäckstedt isn't building what looks set to be a glittering career, the Welshwoman is building massive Lego structures.

Read the full article at Zoe Bäckstedt: ‘Obviously, I Want to Win Everything, That Is Why I Ride a Bike’ on Velo.
author: sstokes
